product_description: rectangle shaped sandal wood colored cutting board suitable for chopping made of wood with cylinderical hole for hanging

copy_data.primary_copy: Transform your kitchen with this elegant sandalwood cutting board - the perfect blend of style and functionality.
copy_data.headline: Elevate Your Food Prep Experience
copy_data.description: Crafted from premium wood, this durable cutting board doubles as kitchen decor with its modern design and convenient hanging feature.

claude_optimized_prompt: A photorealistic modern kitchen scene with a sandalwood-colored wooden cutting board placed on a white marble countertop, fresh herbs and vegetables scattered artistically around, soft natural lighting from left window, shallow depth of field, professional food photography style, rule of thirds composition with negative space, 8k quality

image_generation_result.revised_prompt: A photorealistic modern kitchen with a sandalwood-colored wooden cutting board placed on a clean white marble countertop. Fresh herbs like parsley and basil, as well as vegetables such as tomatoes and colorful bell peppers, are scattered artistically around. The scene is illuminated with soft natural light coming from a window on the left side. The composition adheres to the rule of thirds, featuring a shallow depth of field and negative space for a professional aesthetic. The overall style mimics high-end food photography and the image is rendered in stunning 8k quality.
image_generation_result.original_prompt: A photorealistic modern kitchen scene with a sandalwood-colored wooden cutting board placed on a white marble countertop, fresh herbs and vegetables scattered artistically around, soft natural lighting from left window, shallow depth of field, professional food photography style, rule of thirds composition with negative space, 8k quality
